actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require a health warning on the labels of bottles containing certain alcoholic beverages.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Alcohol Administration Act to make it unlawful to sell, ship, deliver for sale or shipment, or otherwise introduce in interstate or foreign commerce any bottle containing a beverage of more than 24 percent alcohol unless the label of such bottle contains a specified warning with respect to the health hazards of alcoholic beverages.

titles.title: A bill to require a health warning on the labels of bottles containing certain alcoholic beverages.
